channel.title: Din Midi in to USB out? (Sysex bulk dump from DIN connected BCR to laptop)
channel.description: This might be in the docs somewhere but I haven't found it yet. I have a BCR2000 connected via DIN Midi to my Axoloti. My Axoloti is also USB connected to my laptop. Can I do s Sysex bulk dump from my BCR2000 through my Axoloti to my laptop?

item.title: Din Midi in to USB out? (Sysex bulk dump from DIN connected BCR to laptop)
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Pygmy:

Can I do s Sysex bulk dump from my BCR2000 through my Axoloti to my laptop?

Officially I don't think Axo supports sysex. But I think someone made something that can either send sysex out of Axoloti or Axoloti can receive sysex.

By searching for sysex, these posts comes up:
https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/search?q=sysex

But to be honest not sure if you would be able to send it dtright thrue. Check some of the links above, I am sure it will be in there somewhere.

Read full topic
item.source: Din Midi in to USB out? (Sysex bulk dump from DIN connected BCR to laptop)
